column4: So, I need some help with gpart. I've read man pages amongst other things. I'm just a bit too ignorant
I can't figure out how to actually create partitions
ahhhhhh. Well, problem is I want to install Windows XP...and when I used its disk, it wanted it's partition already made
delete some space so you have "free space" partition - then winxp will ask if you want to ouse this free space
